org.gbif.occurrencestore.search

Class OccurrenceSearchTestIT

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.occurrencestore.search.OccurrenceSearchTestIT

  • public class OccurrenceSearchTestIT
extends Object
    Test class for integration tests for the OccurrenceSearchService class. Internally loads data from a csv file into a HBase minicluster and an embedded Solr server; both server instances are shared among test cases.

    • Nested Class Summary
